subject: Baseball
Television
lead_paragraph: As an accomplished pitcher in Japan, Hisanori Takahashi could have stayed there and made more money. Instead, he announced a plan to pitch in the United States before he knew if any teams wanted him.
snippet: As an accomplished pitcher in Japan, Hisanori Takahashi could have stayed there and made more money. Instead, he announced a plan to pitch in the United States before he knew if any teams wanted him.
